name: Aggregated4
short_description: Aggregated4 is an open-source, news aggregator. It is planned to [initially] support RSS (versions 0.9 to 2.0, and further if applicable), Atom (0.3 to 1.0, and further if applicable), and in subsequent releases podcast catching, Torrent downloads, etc.
